observations: Wrapped component tree with I18nextProvider at appropriate hierarchy level
Provider positioned after BrowserRouter but before ThemeProvider

patterns_discovered.rationale: Follows standard React provider pattern with routing at top level, then i18n, theme, and UI providers nested appropriately

patterns_discovered.description: i18n configuration imported from separate config file
patterns_discovered.rationale: Centralized i18n configuration allows reusability and easier maintenance

patterns_discovered.description: Only necessary imports and wrapping added to main.tsx
patterns_discovered.rationale: Keeps root file focused on provider setup without adding business logic

gotchas_discovered.description: I18nextProvider must be placed in correct position within provider hierarchy for proper i18n context propagation
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Positioned after routing provider but before child component providers

gotchas_discovered.description: Relies on ./i18n/config file existing and being properly configured
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Configuration file must be created before provider integration works

approach_outcome.summary: I18nextProvider successfully integrated into main.tsx with proper provider hierarchy

recommendations.rationale: The integration imports ./i18n/config which must be properly configured for runtime functionality
Ensure I18nextProvider properly propagates i18n context throughout component tree
Document why I18nextProvider is positioned between BrowserRouter and other providers for future maintainers
If i18n config is complex, prevent unnecessary re-initialization on component re-renders
